document_data.name: Redtoe
document_data.home: [[Temple of the Forgotten God]], [[Spine of the World]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Redtoe''' was a [[verbeeg]] guard in the [[Temple of the Forgotten God]] within the [[Spine of the World]].
document_data.Description: The brown-haired [[giant]] fought with a [[halberd]] and [[shield]].
document_data.Personality: Fearful for his own skin, the verbeeg knew when to fight and when to flee.
document_data.History: In [[Eleint]], [[1281 DR]], Redtoe fled the temple to the [[Forgotten God]] after a [[Talona|Talonite]] assassin poisoned members in search of the [[Heartstone Gem]]. To avoid his own destruction, Redtoe pretended to be dead then escaped from the temple.
